name: Cheetah-iOS
summary: iOS SDK for Picovoice's Cheetah speech-to-text engine.
description:
Cheetah is an on-device streaming speech-to-text engine.

Cheetah is:
  - Private, all voice processing runs locally.
  - Accurate
  - Compact and computationally-Efficient
  - cross-platform:
    - Linux (x86_64)
    - macOS (x86_64, arm64)
    - Windows (x86_64)
    - Android
    - iOS
    - Raspberry Pi (3, 4, 5)
